value: directions=300m from Iwamatsu, down a slope and over a small bridge.
content=This is a very nice hotel and has both indoor and outdoor baths, though the outdoor bath is rather small.  Free bus to/from Sakunami station running hourly.
content=A big outdoor area with a few baths next to a river. Great just after winter when the snow from the mountains is melting and the river is rushing by. Onsen for overnight guests only.
